title: Embedded Software Engineer
description: <ul><li>Description: We have an opportunity for a<br><br></li></ul>Fullstack developer! If you are an EXPERT full stack developer actively looking for a role please apply* *this role does require onsite availability at least one day a week We are seeking a Full Stack Software Engineer with a Back-End emphasis, that is capable of delivering a project from start to finish. This person will be responsible for Cloud/Server based software development featuring the Linux, Postgres, Golang/C/C++, Swagger/RESTAPI, ReactJS. This role is expected to provide strong technical leadership and mentor less experienced members within the framework of an Agile software development team. The Software Engineer must exhibit a strong sense of ownership regarding the technical solutions arrived at when implementing complex software designs. The work involves the full complement of software life cycle development activities required to deploy high quality software that meets the requirements of our aerospace customers.<br><br>The candidate will be working in: React for the U.I. Go (Golang or Go programming) for the back-end C/C++ experience could be good enough if someone doesn't have Golang The candidate will also be responsible for database architecture and SQL programming. The candidate will have the opportunity to mentor others and assign work. The candidate needs to understand full stack development from start to finish and be able to deliver an end product / website<br><br>Responsibilities: Participate in software development activities including requirement specification, design definition, code implementation, system integration and test Generate software lifecycle documentation to support certification of products Integrate and debug Linux Server based software executing on Servers in Cloud based environments Participate and contribute to Sprint Planning, Backlog grooming, Sprint Demos. Perform and/or provide guidance for verification activities including test definition, test development and testing methods Work daily in Azure DevOps to do requirements analysis, requirement derivation, create User Stories and Task, Perform Code Reviews Establish test frameworks to implement Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) Enhance Linux based systems by studying the latest open source software Utilize avionics standards such as ARINC and RTCA in the development testing<br><br>About Actalent:<br><br>Actalent connects passion with purpose. Our scalable talent solutions and services capabilities drive value and results and provide the expertise to help our customers achieve more. Every day, our experts around the globe are making an impact. We’re supporting critical initiatives in engineering and sciences that advance how companies serve the world. Actalent promotes consultant care and engagement through experiences that enable continuous development. Our people are the difference. Actalent is an operating company of Allegis Group, the global leader in talent solutions. The company is an equal opportunity employer and will consider all applications without regards to race, sex, age, color, religion, national origin, veteran status, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information or any characteristic protected by law.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description: <strong>Responsibilities:</strong><p><br></p>Develop, support, modify, test &amp; implement various web and windows project and change requests. Individual needs to be an expert in the technology in order to complete the programming work quickly and cost effectively. Experience in the entire SDLC will be required as they will be working directly with business departments for requirements gathering and will create their own functional and technical specs and then continue on to the development, testing, implementation, and support. Daily activities will include being assigned maintenance change requests, working with the business areas to further refine the specifications for the request, creation of functional &amp; technical specs, testing (unit and business approval), implementing, and supporting the changes. There is a possibility to do new development/project work as well. They will design and implement a Microsoft Dev Ops solution in the web and windows area.<p><br></p><strong>Minimum Requirements:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Extensive experience in the Microsoft Development stack: ASP.net, ASP.net Core, ASP.net Core Identity Security, MVC, SQL, C#, Bootstrap, Entity Framework, LINQ, JQuery, MS Visual Studio, JS, AJAX, TFS.</li><li>Excellent SQL Server skills including experience with SQL Server 2012, 2016 and 2019.</li><li>Deep understanding of T-SQL, complex Joins, Stored Procedures, and Triggers.</li><li>Deep understanding of the fundamental technologies of the web: HTTP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and JSON.</li><li>Understanding of common Object-Oriented programing concepts. </li><li>Experience and understanding of the full SDLC including gathering business requirements, designing solutions, and working with stakeholders to test and implement the solutions you build.</li><li>Experience working on large enterprise applications. </li><li>Ability to work independently</li><li>Participation in at least two enterprise development projects</li><li>Office 365 Microsoft tools </li><li>Strong verbal and written communication skills</li><li>Experience designing and implementing Dev Ops in a production environment (at least 1 significant project).</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Preferred Requirements:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>SSAS, Bootstrap, Classic ASP, VB6</li><li>Two years or more project lead experience or direct business contact.</li><li>Experience with SQL Server Reporting Services, SQL Server Integration Services and Microsoft Power BI.</li><li>Microsoft Certified Professional with 8+ years of web/windows development experience</li><li>Manufacturing or Steel experience</li><li>Understanding of SAP S/4 HANA (1709 or higher)</li></ul><p><br></p><strong>Education Requirements:</strong><p><br></p><ul><li>Relevant 4 year degree or equivalent experience</li></ul>

title: React Developer - Must be US Citizen
description: <strong>We are looking for Full Stack Developer in Chicago, IL - W2 Only </strong><p><br></p>As a member of our Software Engineering Group, we look first and foremost for people who are passionate around solving business problems through innovation and engineering practices. You'll be required to apply your depth of knowledge and expertise to all aspects of the software development lifecycle, as well as partner continuously with your many stakeholders on a daily basis to stay focused on common goals. We embrace a culture of experimentation and constantly strive for improvement and learning. title: SI Cloud Automation Developer
description: A Chicago-based financial institution is looking to hire on a Full Stack Software Engineer. You'd be in office twice a week with a team ready to mentor you in your career.<p><br></p>You'd be coming in to work on one of their core applications primarily with modern versions of Angular. Their Back End is .Net based and will be less of your focus while there, since you'll primarily be working on the Front End. This role is not a position where you're expected to be an expert yet. They're looking for someone who they can mold and help in the earlier stages of their career. That said, they are expecting someone who has a strong foundation and understanding of CS fundamentals. If you're looking for your next step, hit apply! Required Skills &amp; Experience<p><br></p><ul><li>1+ year(s) of professional experience </li><li>Strong experience with JavaScript and related Front End Libraries like Angular </li><li>Strong CS Fundamentals understanding </li><li>Experience working with a senior team </li><li>BS+ in CS/STEM/Related </li></ul> Desired Skills &amp; Experience<p><br></p><ul><li>Experience in the finance space </li><li>Strong communications skills </li><li>Experience working in .Net/C# </li><li>Experience working in hybrid environments </li></ul> What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown<p><br></p><ul><li>80% Front End Development </li><li>20% Back End Development </li></ul> Daily Responsibilities<p><br></p><ul><li>70% Hands On </li><li>30% Team Collaboration </li></ul> The Offer<p><br></p><ul><li>Competitive salaries </li></ul> You will receive the following benefits:<p><br></p><ul><li>Medical Insurance </li><li>Dental Benefits </li><li>Vision Benefits </li><li>Paid Time Off (PTO) </li><li>401(k) </li></ul><p><br></p>Applicants must be currently authorized to work in the US on a full-time basis now and in the future.<p><br></p>Full Stack Software Engineer / Angular<p><br></p>
